steps.name: I am on SFWF Front Office Home Page "Chrome"
I Input Registered User's Username "Yavishta" and Password "Admin@123"
I Click on Sign In button
I Verify Applicant's Successful Login
I Click on Register as Farmer
I Verify that User is directed to My Application Page
I Verify display of Farmers Card link
I Verify Programmes link
I Click on New Button to apply for Registration
I Verify display of Registration Type Page
I Click on Tea Grower Icon
I Verify display of REGISTRATION FOR TEA GROWERS Page
I Select an Applicant Title "Mrs"
I Select Applicant District "Port Louis"
I Select Applicant Education Level "Tertiary"
I Select Agricultural Activity "Full Time"
I Input Other Occupation "Manager"

steps.name: I Upload Photograph "src\test\resources\Photo_upload.jpg"
I Verify for Photo upload success message
I Select No of years for Registration membership "2"
I Select Marital Status "Married"
I Click on Save and Continue
I Verify Display of Particulars of Family Beneficiaries Page
I Click on Add Family and Beneficiaries
Verify Display of Particulars of Family Beneficiaries input table
I Select Family relationship "Spouse"
I Input Family Surname "Keen"
I Input Family Other Names "Dafne"
I Select Family Gender "Female"
I Input Family Date of Birth "1Jan94"
I Input Family Occupation "Actress"
I Click on Beneficiary of life Insurance Scheme
I Click on Beneficiary of Accident Insurance Scheme
I Save Particulars of Family and Beneficiaries
I Click on Save and Continue
I Verify Display of Particulars for Registration of Tea Plantation
I Click on Add Tea Plantation
I Verify Display of Particulars for Registration of Tea Plantation Table
I Input License No "Tea Grower"
I Input Total Extent of plot (In Arpent) "2.7"
I Select Type of Owner "Tenant"
I Input Plot Location "Moka"
I Save Particulars of Crop
I Click on Save and Continue
I Verify Terms and Conditions Page
I click on I agree to the Terms and Conditions
I Select Bank "ABC Banking"
I Input Bank Branch for Agro-Processing Enterprise "Port Louis"
I Input Personal Bank Account Number Agro-Processing Enterprise "0001252563636"
I Click on Submit Application "Yes"
I Verify Success message for application submitted
I Verify Application Status "Submitted"
I Verify Payment Status "Pending"
I Sign Out as Front Registered User

name: User Story 12599 - Register as Tea Grower
